title: 'Not for plus size women'
body: Not for plus size women though the size specifies it's XxL still when worn its not the size you expect and length is ankle length but cloth is thick not transparent stitching is also good.. just that not meant for plus size specially not for women who have curves below their waistline.. anyways it's upto u all yo decide.. arrives after a week or so after placing order .. new packaging new product .. yet not satisfied but for the price you pay it's very reasonable or cheaper than market price that I can assure..
